gd.gen-ai.global-error: A bloke didn't see this stuff-up coming.
gd.gen-ai.global-error.button-clear: Clear chat and give it another go
gd.gen-ai.disclaimer: AI mates can stuff up. Double-check before you bank on their responses.
gd.gen-ai.welcome.line-2: How can I give you a hand mate?
gd.gen-ai.welcome.option-1.title: Search for a dashboard or visualisation
gd.gen-ai.welcome.option-1.answer: No worries, what kind of dashboard or visualisation would you like to see?
gd.gen-ai.welcome.option-2.title: Create a new visualisation
gd.gen-ai.welcome.option-2.answer: Sure thing, what kind of visualisation would you like to create?
gd.gen-ai.welcome.option-3.title: Respond to a business query.
gd.gen-ai.welcome.option-3.answer: No worries, what business query would you like to respond to?
gd.gen-ai.global-error.description: Give rebooting the chatbot a go and start afresh.
gd.gen-ai.save-dialog.label: Name
gd.gen-ai.save-dialog.title: Name your visualisation
gd.gen-ai.save-dialog.description: Give your new visualisation a new descriptive name, so it's easier to find it later on.
